text: Table 9.1 Syndromes associated with urogenital abnormalities Beckwith— Wilms’ tumor Macroglossia, hemihypertrophy, Wiedemann hepatoblastoma, hypoglycemia Cerebro-oculo- Renal agenesis, Arthrogryposis, microcephaly, cataracts facial cryptorchidism CHARGE Small genitalia Coloboma, congenital heart defects, choanal atresia, ear anomalies Cornelia de Small genitalia, Micromelia, bushy eyebrows Lange cryptorchidism Ehlers—Danlos Hydroureter Skin hyperextensibility, poor wound healing Laurence— Small genitalia Obesity, retinitis pigmentosa, polydactyly Moon-Biedl Marfan Renal duplication, Aortic aneurysm, arachnodactyly hydroureter, cryptorchidism Prader-Willi Cryptorchidism Hypotonia, obesity, mental retardation Prune belly Hydronephrosis, Hypoplastic abdominal muscle, congenital cryptorchidism heart defects, pulmonary hypoplasia, intestinal atresia, malrotation, leg maldevelopment Robinow Small genitalia, Short forearms, flat face cryptorchidism VACTERL Hydronephrosis, renal Vertebral anomalies anorectal atresia VSD dysplasia, hypospadias choanal atresia tracheoesophageal fistula deafness
